clinical_study.brief_title: Substudy - Evaluation of Patients With Iliac Vein Thrombosis
clinical_study.official_title: Iliofemoral Thrombosis and Postthrombotic Syndrome: Registration and Analysis Within the Frankfurt Thrombophilia Registry

brief_summary.textblock: Patients with previous diagnosis of iliac vein thrombosis are enrolled in this registry. Using standardized questionnaire, clinical data detailing venous thromboembolism and contributing VTE risk factors are recorded. Results of technical and laboratory investigations including screening of thrombophilic disorders were additionally entered into the database.

primary_outcome.measure: Incidence and severity of postthrombotic Syndrome after iliofemoral thrombosis
primary_outcome.time_frame: up to 20 years after occurrence of iliofemoral thrombosis
primary_outcome.description: The incidence and severity of postthrombotic Syndrome will be measured by te VILALLTA-Score

Distribution of affected side in Iliofemoral thrombosis

study_pop.textblock: Subjects with previous iliofermoral thrombosis, which has been proven by objective measurements (Duplex sonography, phlebography, CT/MRT)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- >18 years
- subjects with iliofermoral thrombosis, which has been proven by objective measurements (Duplex sonography, phlebography, CT/MRT) later than 1996
Exclusion Criteria:
- <18 years
- > 80 years
- surface or deep vein thrombosis without affection of pelvis
